title: Revolutionary War Airports (1770s)
description:
# Revolutionary War Airports (1770s)

- **July 4, 2019:** Lincoln Memorial speech claimed Continental Army **"took over the airports"** in the Revolutionary War
- **Full quote:** "Our Army manned the air, it rammed the ramparts, it took over the airports, it did everything it had to do" [Source: Speech transcript, July 4, 2019]
- Wright Brothers' first flight: **1903** - over 125 years after the Revolutionary War ended
- First commercial airport: College Park, Maryland, **1909**
- Also confused Revolutionary War (1775-1783) with War of 1812, referencing Fort McHenry (1814)
- Blamed teleprompter malfunction [Source: Trump statement]
- #RevolutionaryWarAirports trended worldwide
